alert.note: Alert for Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 6:00AM AKDT until March 28 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow, and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility down to one quarter mile or less at times. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult.
